Label: Record ID
Description: Identifies the record type; LI or LZ.

Sample Entry: Text data. Lengths: min 15, max 15, avg 15.0. Sample: RSHIPS
Label: Product Code

Sample Entry: Discrete values: BKI, BPC, BSF, DOW, DRY, ELF, ENG, ENI
Label: Language

Label: Description 1
Description: Primary description in the specified language.

Sample Entry: Text data. Lengths: min 40, max 40, avg 40.0. Sample: LUZEM
Label: Description 2
Description: Secondary description in the specified language.
